tool_description: This API allows you to extract text from an image of a PAN card.
title: India - Pan card OCR

api_list.name: GET Call
api_list.description: Used to fetch api result using the request id received in responses.

api_list.name: India - Pan card OCR
api_list.description:
This API allows you to extract the text present on Pan card. Pan card is an Indian document issued by National Securities Depository Limited. NSDL is an Indian central securities depository under the jurisdiction of the Securities and Exchange Board of India, based in Mumbai.

Use get call on the left and pass the request id to fetch api call results.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://india-pan-card-ocr.p.rapidapi.com/v3/tasks/sync/extract/ind_pan"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "india-pan-card-ocr.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
